attributes.action: Abolish the license fee paid to the BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC no longer adheres to its motto "Nation Shall Speak Peace Unto Nation", is no longer impartial, and is foisting digital television on us with no contingency plans for disposing of all redundant sets.

Under these circumstances some other way must be found to fund its activites,(paying less to so called celbraties would be a good place to start, not offering reporters one hundred pounds to investigate peerages would be another)compete on the open market with other services and cease threatening people to buy a license just because they own a TV set.

rejection.details:
There is a very similar petition already online:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/bbcsubscription/
If you still wish your own to be launched, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
